replies.body: For the love of god, make a set focused around the champs that get no love. I know you are a company that needs profit but just one skin would make the people that use them so...so happy. Urgot, Swain, Irelia to name a few. one last thing, stop, please stop making master yi skins.
Well, they did make a skin for Yorick
i want better jax skin, nothing for jax in long time....
